name: Ball Trump PRO
description:
*Apps On Sale* Get one now while it lasts! Thank You For Playing! Enjoy!
- No In App Purchases.
- No ads.
- No internet connection needed to play.
- Early access sale price
- Figure out ball movement to score
- Created by a developer with a heart
- Good luck
- Enjoy

Tilt, Jump, Drop the ball as you go along, getting scores to beat your friends! The Trumping ball has now arrived! Play this fantastic and addictive game and get hours of fun.


Always ad free. No ads. No IAP. No crippled game play. Just game.
